snippet.title: Fallout Shelter Online | What to Expect
snippet.description:
Fallout Shelter Online is the official successor to Fallout Shelter. Alongside the classic Vault management feature, in Fallout Shelter Online, players are also able to recruit famous heroes from the Fallout series, build perfect adventure teams, face dangerous foes, and venture into the wild Wasteland! Whoever survives the Wasteland rules the Wasteland. Overseer, do you have what it takes to build a better future for tomorrow's post-apocalyptic world?

https://fosol.gaea.com/en/
